description: Allows notifications to be sent using sms / mms via the catapult bandwidth api.

src.description: One of your catapult telephone numbers the message should come from (must be in E.164 format, like C(+19195551212)).

user_id.description: User Id from Api account page.

dest.description: The phone number or numbers the message should be sent to (must be in E.164 format, like C(+19195551212)).

media.description: For MMS messages, a media url to the location of the media to be sent with the message.

api_secret.description: Api Secret from Api account page.

api_token.description: Api Token from Api account page.

msg.description: The contents of the text message (must be 2048 characters or less).
